AI Description: gcccuda is a wrapper around the GCC C compiler that enables CUDA programming directly in C without the need for NVCC. It allows developers to write CUDA code using familiar C syntax and compile it with the GCC compiler.
Core Features: Enables Cuda Programming In C Using Gcc Compiler, No Need For Nvcc, Supports Cuda Features & Optimizations
General Tags: Cuda Programming, C Compiler Wrapper, Parallel Computing
